# IMPORT

## Import librairies
```{r import-librairies}
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(cowplot)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(Seurat)
library(SCpubr)
library(patchwork)

source("~/Projects/phd/scripts/colors_universal.R")
```

## Import data
```{r import-data}
seur_integrated <- readRDS("./data/seurat_objects/seurat_human_integrated_object_23_12_01.rds")
DimPlot(seur_integrated, reduction="umap_integrated", cols = cols_integrated)

seur_pbmc_mait <- readRDS("./data/seurat_objects/pbmc_objects/seurat_pbmc_mait_clean.rds")
```

## Analysis 1
```{r analysis-1}
DimPlot(seur_pbmc_mait, group.by="clusters_per_lineage", cols = cols_pbmc_mait)
FeaturePlot(seur_pbmc_mait, features=c("NCAM1", "PDCD1", "CD27", "CD69"), order=T)
DotPlot(seur_pbmc_mait, group.by="clusters_per_lineage", features=c("NCAM1", "PDCD1", "CD27", "CD69", "GNLY", "PRF1"), dot.scale=10)
```
